Body:
self.model = CrossEntropyMNL(solver='lbfgs', fit_intercept=True, est_stderr
    =True, reg_method='l2', alpha=0.1, l1_ratio=0, tol=0.0001, max_iter=100,
    coef=None, stderr=None, n_classes=None)
self.model.fit(self.data_anes96.exog[6:9, :], self.y_disturbed[6:9,],
    sample_weight=0.5)
self.assertEqual(self.model.coef.shape, (7, 6))
np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(self.model.loglike_per_sample(self.
    data_anes96.exog[6:9, :], self.y_disturbed[6:9,]), np.array([-0.336, -
    0.389, -0.398]), decimal=3)
np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(self.model.loglike_per_sample(self.
    data_anes96.exog[6:9, :], label_binarize([3, 1, 4], list(range(7)))),
    np.array([-3.415, -4.506, -2.367]), decimal=3)
np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(self.model.loglike_per_sample(self.
    data_anes96.exog[6:9, :], label_binarize([3, 0, 5], list(range(7)))),
    np.array([-3.415, -4.492, -4.301]), decimal=3)
